::Shadow Wing::

She pulled a bunch of charred wired out of the power box and 
reattached the new wires. She added a few new power circuits and 
rerouted others.  If she was lucky, in a few days, she could have 
power restored to Teletran. But she frowned at herself. It would only 
be power.  She had no idea how extensive the damage was and wouldn't 
know untill she had Teletran up and at least talking.
